entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -20.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport 09:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -20.1°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -26.6°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
